award_title: REU Site: Research experiences in marine and estuarine disturbance ecology of the Gulf Coast
subject: Credit when your methods actually get used
body:
REU code usually dies when students graduate, or each cohort rebuilds the same pipelines from scratch.

I built Ouro to fix thisâ€”published methods become callable infrastructure so others can build on your work without reimplementing.

Citations capture acknowledgment, not influence. Ouro shows actual use.

Quick call after the holidays?

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
